languages.text: "Считайте, что это отпечаток моего ремесла. Вот это..." {n}— Механическая ладонь Джай сжимается в кулак. — {/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}. Тупоголовые орки... Эх, кто ж знал, что на обломки имперского рейдера позарились не только мы? А это сокровище..."{n} — Джай касается драгоценного шейного {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}.{/n} "...я получила в награду за хорошую жизнь. Слишком торопилась в "Адептус Амасекус" после того, как Великий благословил меня безмерным богатством. За две подворотни меня и подстерег ничтожный ашмаг, позавидовавший чужой удаче". {n}Женщина проводит большим пальцем поперек шеи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Считайте, что это отпечаток моего ремесла. Вот это..." {n}— Механическая ладонь Джай сжимается в кулак. — {/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}. Тупоголовые орки... Эх, кто ж знал, что на обломки имперского рейдера позарились не только мы? А это сокровище..."{n} — Джай касается драгоценного шейного {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}.{/n} "...я получила в награду за хорошую жизнь. Слишком торопилась в "Адептус Амасекус" после того, как Великий благословил меня безмерным богатством. За две подворотни меня и подстерег ничтожный ашмаг, позавидовавший чужой удаче". {n}Женщина проводит большим пальцем поперек шеи.{/n}"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Считайте, что это отпечаток моего ремесла. Вот это..." {n}— Механическая ладонь Джай сжимается в кулак. — {/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Ксеносы{/g}. Тупоголовые орки... Эх, кто ж знал, что на обломки имперского рейдера позарились не только мы? А это сокровище..."{n} — Джай касается драгоценного шейного {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланта{/g}.{/n} "...я получила в награду за хорошую жизнь. Слишком торопилась в "Адептус Амасекус" после того, как Великий благословил меня безмерным богатством. За две подворотни меня и подстерег ничтожный ашмаг, позавидовавший чужой удаче". {n}Женщина проводит большим пальцем поперек шеи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Consider this a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}— Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist. — {/n} "Is Maadari. Dumb-headed green orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of an Imperial raider? As for this treasure..."{n} — Jae touches her precious neck implant.{/n} "...I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to "Adeptus Amasecus" after the Great One blessed me with wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}The woman drags a thumb across her throat.{/n}"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Consider this a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}— Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist. — {/n} "Is Maadari. Dumb-headed green orks... I was in a hurry to get to "Adeptus Amasecus" after the Great One blessed me with wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}The woman drags a thumb across her throat.{/n}"

Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “就当这是我的商标吧。至于这个……”{n}婕伊将机械手握成了拳头。{/n}“…….是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}弄的，是那群呆头呆脑的兽人……谁能想得到，当时除了我们之外，还有别人被那艘掠袭者战机的残骸吸引过去呢？至于这件宝物嘛……”{n}婕伊摸了摸她昂贵的脖子{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。{/n}“我猜这算是生活对我的奖励吧，因为我的生活过得有点太滋润了。当时，至高无上的神皇赐予了我一笔巨大的财富，于是我急匆匆地赶去艾玛赛克烈酒修会。可当我离那间酒馆只有两条街的时候，有个可怜的坏种袭击了我，估计他很嫉妒别人能赚到钱吧。”{n}她用拇指在自己的喉咙上划过。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就当这是我的商标吧。至于这个……”{n}婕伊将机械手握成了拳头。{/n}“…….是{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}弄的，是那群呆头呆脑的兽人……谁能想得到，当时除了我们之外，还有别人被那艘帝国掠袭者战机的残骸吸引过去呢？至于这件宝物嘛……”{n}婕伊摸了摸她昂贵的脖子{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。{/n}“我猜这算是生活对我的奖励吧，因为我的生活过得有点太滋润了。当时，至高无上的神皇赐予了我一笔巨大的财富，于是我急匆匆地赶去艾玛赛克烈酒修会。可当我离那间酒馆只有两条街的时候，有个可怜的坏家伙袭击了我，估计他很嫉妒别人能赚到钱吧。”{n}她用拇指在自己的喉咙上划过。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...xenos. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck implant.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

languages.text: «Considérelo un gaje del oficio. Esto de aquí...». {n}La mano mecánica de Jae se cierra para formar un puño.{/n} «...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}. Estúpidos Orkos... ¿Cómo íbamos a saber que les interesaban los restos de un incursor? En cuanto a esta joya...». {n}Jae toca su valioso {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} del cuello.{/n} «Fue mi recompensa por una vida demasiado buena. Tenía prisa por llegar al Adeptus Amasecus después de que el Exaltado me bendijera con una inmensa riqueza. A dos calles del antro, un patético ashmag me atacó por envidia de mi fortuna». {n}Se pasa el pulgar por la garganta.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Considérelo un gaje del oficio. Esto de aquí...». {n}La mano mecánica de Jae se cierra para formar un puño.{/n} «...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}. Estúpidos orkos... ¿Cómo íbamos a saber que les interesaban los restos de un incursor imperial? En cuanto a esta joya...».{n} Jae toca su valioso {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implante{/g} del cuello.{/n} «Fue mi recompensa por una vida demasiado buena. Tenía prisa por llegar al Adeptus Amasecus después de que el Exaltado me bendijera con una inmensa riqueza. A dos calles del antro, un patético ashmag me atacó por envidia de mi fortuna». {n}Se pasa el pulgar por la garganta.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そいつはあたしの取引の証だとでも思ってちょうだい。これは…」{n}ジェイの機械の手が拳を握りしめる。{/n}「…{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}。バカなオルクだ…あの襲撃船の残骸に誘引されるのはあたしらだけじゃないってわかってるだろ？特に、お宝とくれば…」{n}ジェイは大事な首の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}に触れる。{/n}「あたしは、ちょっと良すぎた人生の褒美としてそれを受け取った。エグザルテッド・ワンの加護によって莫大な富を授かった後、アデプトゥス・アマセックに行くために急いでいた。巣穴から裏通りに2本入ったところで、哀れなアッシュマグが、他人の幸運を妬んで襲いかかってきたのさ」{n}彼女は親指をのどに引っ掛けるように身振りをした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そいつはあたしの取引の証だとでも思ってちょうだい。これは…」{n}ジェイの機械の手が拳を握りしめる。{/n}「…{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}。バカなオルクだ…あの襲撃船の残骸に誘引されるのはあたしらだけじゃないってわかってるだろ？特に、お宝とくれば…」{n}ジェイは大事な首の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}に触れる。{/n}「あたしは、ちょっと良すぎた人生の褒美としてそれを受け取った。エグザルテッド・ワンの加護によって莫大な富を授かった後、アデプトゥス・アマセックに行くために急いでいた。巣穴から裏通りに2本入ったところで、哀れなアッシュマグが、他人の幸運を妬んで襲いかかってきたのさ」{n}彼女は親指をのどに引っ掛けるように身振りをした。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Seht es einfach als Zeichen meines Berufs. Dies hier"{n}, Jaes mechanische Hand ballt sich zu einer Faust, "{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, dämliche Orks ... Wer hätte gedacht, dass wir nicht die Einzigen sind, die von dem Wrack dieses Raiders angelockt werden? Und was diesen Schatz angeht ..." {n} Jae berührt ihr geliebtes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Halsimplantat{/g}.{/n} "Ich habe es als Belohnung für ein etwas zu gutes Leben erhalten. Ich war in Eile, zum Adeptus Amasecus zu gelangen, nachdem der Erhabene mich mit immensem Reichtum gesegnet hatte. Ich war zwei Straßen entfernt, als ein erbärmlicher Ashmag mich angriff, neidisch auf das Glück anderer." {n}Sie fährt sich mit dem Daumen über die Kehle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Seht es einfach als Zeichen meines Berufs. Dies hier"{n}, Jaes mechanische Hand ballt sich zu einer Faust, "{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, dämliche Orks ... Wer hätte gedacht, dass wir nicht die Einzigen sind, die von dem Wrack eines imperialen Raiders angelockt werden? Und was diesen Schatz angeht ..."{n} Jae berührt ihr geliebtes {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Halsimplantat{/g}.{/n} "Ich habe es als Belohnung für ein etwas zu gutes Leben erhalten. Ich war in Eile, zum Adeptus Amasecus zu gelangen, nachdem der Erhabene mich mit immensem Reichtum gesegnet hatte. Ich war zwei Straßen entfernt, als ein erbärmlicher Ashmag mich angriff, neidisch auf das Glück anderer." {n}Sie fährt sich mit dem Daumen über die Kehle.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Disons que mon métier a laissé sa marque sur moi. Celle-ci, {n}dit Jae en serrant son poing mécanique,{/n} je la dois à des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. Ces crétins d'Orks... Qui aurait cru que nous n'étions pas les seuls à nous intéresser à l'épave de ce croiseur ? Quant à ce trésor, {n}dit-elle en touchant le précieux {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} de son cou,{/n} je l'ai reçu en récompense d'une vie qui avait été un tout petit peu trop belle. Je me dépêchais de retourner à l'Adeptus Amasecus après que l'Exalté m'a fait don d'une immense richesse. J'étais à deux ruelles du repaire quand un misérable ashmag m'a attaquée, envieux de ma bonne fortune. » {n}Elle termine en faisant glisser son pouce sur sa gorge.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Disons que mon métier a laissé sa marque sur moi. Celle-ci, {n}dit Jae en serrant son poing mécanique,{/n} je la dois à des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. Ces crétins d'Orks... Qui aurait cru que nous n'étions pas les seuls à nous intéresser à l'épave de ce croiseur impérial ? Quant à ce trésor,{n} dit-elle en touchant le précieux {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g} de son cou,{/n} je l'ai reçu en récompense d'une vie qui avait été un tout petit peu trop belle. Je me dépêchais de retourner à l'Adeptus Amasecus après que l'Exalté m'a fait don d'une immense richesse. J'étais à deux ruelles du repaire quand un misérable ashmag m'a attaquée, envieux de ma bonne fortune. » {n}Elle termine en faisant glisser son pouce sur sa gorge.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Mesleğin gerekliliği diyelim. Bu mesela..." {n}Jae'ın mekanik elleri yumulup yumruk hâlini alıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} işi. Geri beyinli Orklar. Baskıncı enkazına ağzı sulanan başkaları olabileceğini kim bilebilirdi ki? Bu hazineye gelince..." {n}Jae, boynundaki o çok değerli {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantına{/g} dokunuyor.{/n} "Haddinden fazla iyi giden hayatım için aldığım ödül olarak görebilirsin. Görkemli bana müthiş bir hazine bahşettikten sonra bir an önce Adeptus Amasekus'a ulaşmaya çalışıyordum. Batakhaneden iki sokak uzaktaydım ki başkalarının servetini kıskanan ezik bir külboğazın saldırısına uğradım." {n}Baş parmağını boğazında gezdiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Consider it a mark of my trade. This here..." {n}Jae's mechanical hand balls into a fist.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Dumb-headed Orks... Who knew that we weren't the only ones to get tempted by the wreck of that raider? As for this treasure..." {n}Jae touches her precious neck {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}.{/n} "I received it as a reward for a life that had been just a little too good. I was in a hurry to get to the Adeptus Amasecus after the Exalted One blessed me with immense wealth. I was two backstreets away from the den when a pathetic ashmag attacked me, envious of somebody else's fortune." {n}She drags her thumb across her throat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mesleğin gerekliliği diyelim. Bu mesela..." {n}Jae'ın mekanik elleri yumulup yumruk hâlini alıyor.{/n} "...{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g} işi. Geri beyinli Orklar. Baskıncı enkazına ağzı sulananların tek biz olmadığımızı kim bilebilirdi ki? Bu hazineye gelince..." {n}Jae boynundaki o çok değerli {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}ına dokunuyor.{/n} "Haddinden fazla iyi giden hayatım için aldığım ödül olarak görebilirsin. Görkemli bana müthiş bir hazine bahşettikten sonra bir an önce Adeptus Amasekus'a ulaşmaya çalışıyordum. Batakhaneye sadece iki sokak kalmıştı, başkalarının servetini kıskanan ezik bir külboğazın saldırısına uğradım." {n}Baş parmağını boğazında gezdiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
